CustomField.description: This was created to be used as a unique identifier for updating the Attributes to Salesforce. This is used by the flows that sync to and from Zentitle. The format is the Zentitle ID + Software Attribute ID. The format is the Zentitle ID + - +Software Attribute ID. IE: "a578C000000H9e2QAC-feat_8WdFVdTtbU6TmdshfC92Kg"
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the Software Entitlement ID appended with the Software Attribute ID.
CustomField.label: Software Attribute External ID
